attributes.action: hold an immediate general election through a vote of no confidence in the current Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the spin, knee jerk rushed through legislation, constant undermining of peoples freedoms, constant introduction of new laws when old ones would work if enforced, sidling up to big business, greed and general incompetance of the current Goverment there should be a general election through a vote of no confidence by the public - the people who MP's are supposed to represent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
